com.application.components

Class DBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.application.components.DBManager

  • public class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for connecting to database and making it sound with the file system
    Author:
    Miguel Urízar Salinas

    • Method Detail

      • getProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<Project> getProjects()
        Gets all the projects in the database.

        Returns an empty array if there are no projects at the moment.

        Returns:
        Array of the present projects or null if an error occurred.

      • getProject

        public Project getProject(java.lang.String projectName)
        Gets the project id of the project name
        Parameters:
        projectName - name of the project
        Returns:
        Id of the project, -1 if no project was found or -2 if there was an error in database

      • getTEIStructs

        public java.util.ArrayList<TEIStruct> getTEIStructs()
        Gets all the TEI structures in the database.

        Returns an empty array if there are no TEI structures at the moment.

        Returns:
        Array of the present TEI structures or null if an error occurred.

      • getTEIStruct

        public TEIStruct getTEIStruct(int ID)
        Gets the TEI structure in the database with selected id.
        Returns:
        The TEI structure or null if an error occurred.

      • getFilesFromProject

        public java.util.ArrayList<XMLFile> getFilesFromProject(int projectId)
        Gets all the files from a project in the database.

        Returns an empty array if there are no files at the moment.

        Parameters:
        projectId - Id of the project
        Returns:
        Array of the present files or null if an error occurred.

      • addProject

        public int addProject(java.lang.String projectName)
        Adds a project to the DataBase.

        Creates the folder as the ID + '_' + projectName (example: 1_Project) and adds the structure for the project. If a project with that name already exists, no project is created

        Parameters:
        projectName - Name of the project to check if exists
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly, Constants.FALSE if project exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • addTEIStruct

        public int addTEIStruct(java.lang.String structName)
        Adds a TEI schema to the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        structName - Name of the TEI schema to check if exists
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • addXMLFile

        public int addXMLFile(int projectId,
             java.lang.String fileName,
             java.lang.String filePath)
        Adds a XML file to the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        projectId - Id of the project where the file belongs to
        fileName - Name of the file to introduce
        filePath - Path of the file to introduce
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is introduced correctly, Constants.FALSE if file name already exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • deleteProject

        public int deleteProject(int id)
        Deletes the project with its files.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the project to delete
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is deleted correctly, Constants.FALSE if was impossible to get project path or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • deleteFile

        public int deleteFile(int id)
        Deletes the file and removes from DB. Updates the UIs
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the file to delete
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is deleted correctly, Constants.FALSE if was impossible to get file path or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • deleteFile

        public int deleteFile(int id,
             java.lang.String path)
        Deletes the file and removes from DB.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the file to delete
        path - Path where the file is located
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is deleted correctly or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • updateProjectTEISchema

        public int updateProjectTEISchema(int projectId,
                         int schemaId)
        Updates the project with the new TEI schema
        Parameters:
        projectId - ID of the project to modify.
        schemaId - ID of the schema to link with the project
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is updated correctly or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • updateProjectName

        public int updateProjectName(java.lang.String newName,
                    int id)
        Renames a project in the database with defined id
        Parameters:
        newName - New name for the project
        id - Id of the project to change the name
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is changed correctly, Constants.FALSE if a project with that name exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • updateFileName

        public int updateFileName(java.lang.String newName,
                 int id)
        Renames a file in the database with defined id

        It does not affect the path name.

        Parameters:
        newName - New name for the file
        id - Id of the file to change the name
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if is changed correctly, Constants.FALSE if a file with that name exists or Constants.ERROR if there was an error in DB.

      • checkIfValueExists

        private int checkIfValueExists(java.lang.String value,
                     java.lang.String field,
                     java.lang.String table)
        Checks if a field value exists in a table.
        Parameters:
        value - value to check.
        field - Field where to search.
        table - Table where to search.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if exists, Constants.FALSE if does not exist or Constants.ERROR if there was an error.

      • checkIfDoubleValueExists

        private int checkIfDoubleValueExists(java.lang.String value1,
                           java.lang.String field1,
                           java.lang.String value2,
                           java.lang.String field2,
                           java.lang.String table)
        Checks if two field values exist in a table.
        Parameters:
        value1 - First value to check.
        field1 - First field to check.
        value2 - Second value to check.
        field2 - Second field to check.
        table - Table where to search.
        Returns:
        Constants.TRUE if exists, Constants.FALSE if does not exist or Constants.ERROR if there was an error.

        Gets the path for the project with selected id
        Parameters:
        id - d of the project
        Returns:
        relative path of the project, null if there is a problem getting name or empty string if no project with selected id is present.
